donation.title: Help dogs like Maylo
donation.description: This memorial release is dedicated to Maylo, a rescue dog whose life was saved by an incredible organization. Every purchase through Bandcamp and physical sales go directly to the rescue organization that gave him a loving home.
donation.supportThroughMusicDesc: 100% of all Bandcamp and physical sales donations
donation.supportDirectlyDesc: Donate directly to Mixfelle Dobermann Nothilfe, the organization that saved Maylo

story.title: The story behind the release
story.description: Use this space to tell the story of Maylo, the diagnosis, the last days, and how these songs came to life. Keep it personal and grounded: how writing became a way to stay connected, and how each piece captures a different moment of saying goodbye.

allSongs.title: All Songs
allSongs.description: Each cover marks a different step through grief, memory, and acceptance. Click to jump to the track page.
